score: 0 out of 1 people found the following review useful
review: Thoroughly enjoyed this movie. It's a real 'Popcorn' film. Total escapism.And, if you enjoyed such low budget sci-fi movies as Them, Tremors, District 9, Deep Rising or The Arrival (also by David Twohy) then you won't be disappointed.Using great lighting and special effects, a relatively unknown (Outside of Australia anyway) cast and a different perspective on a familiar storyline Twohy delivers a cool evenings entertainment, with no few shocks, for fans of the genre.8/10 Glen Kimberley as gbkimberley
